name: GameBoy Doom tech demo
description:
This is a weird tech demo of how DooM might run on the GameBoy.

For now it only has a non functional hud, animated gun and a small room to test the 360 movement.

There would probably be some updates in the future adding  stuff like simple enemies,  a bigger map for testing or something that actually looks like it's from the game and more weapons.

Controls:

-----------------------------------------

L & R arrows- turn left and right

up arrow- go forward

down arrow- go backward

Z-shoot

-----------------------------------------
